ğŸ“¢ BulkLinker: Copy, Open, Bookmark, Add to Reading List, or Download Multiple Filtered Links at Once!

ğŸ“Œ Why Choose BulkLinker?

âœª *No sign-up or permissions required*: BulkLinker works right out of the box, with no account needed.
âœª *Privacy-friendly*: It does not request permission to "Read and change all your data on all websites."
âœª *Versatile link extraction*: Extract links in multiple ways, including visible links, full-page links, or select-area links.
âœª *Advanced filtering*: Filter links using various criteria or let AI handle it for you.
âœª *Custom layouts*: View filtered links in either List or Grid format for better visualization.
âœª *On-demand metadata*: Get descriptions, thumbnails, and page titles for links whenever needed.
âœª *Multiple export options*: Export links as HTML (List/Grid), Markdown, CSV, or JSON.
âœª *Seamless performance*: Chrome won't hang or crash, even when opening numerous links at once.
âœª *Lightweight and efficient*: Just 40KB with no tracking, no ads, and no unnecessary bloat.

âŒ¨ï¸ Keyboard Shortcuts for Easy Access:
Alt + M: Open the BulkLinker popup window.
Alt + O: Open links in the selected area.

ğŸ“Œ == Key Features of BulkLinker ==
BulkLinker is an intuitive tool for quickly managing multiple links at once. Whether you want to open several links in new tabs, bookmark them, or copy them to your clipboard, BulkLinker makes it easy with a simple drag-and-select actionâ€”similar to Linkclump but with more advanced features.

âœ… Multiple Methods for Extracting Links:
1. *All links* from the webpage and its iframes.
2. *Visible links only* from the webpage and its iframes.
3. *Select-area links*: Use your mouse to select a portion of the page and extract the links.
4. *Links from uploaded files*: Extract links from HTML, CSV, JSON, or text files.
=>  *Auto-sorting by domain* for easier organization.
=> *Excludes #hash links* automatically for cleaner results.

âœ… Flexible Filtering Options:
1. *Same or Cross-origin* links.
2. *URL segment filters*: Domain, Path 1 segment, path 2 segment filtering.
3. Substring matching to *include* links with specific text.
4. Substring matching to *exclude* links with specific text.
5. *Link wrap-around HTML tags* for advanced filtering.
6. *AI-powered custom filtering*: Provide your own prompt to filter links using AI.

âœ… Export and Extract Links with Metadata:
Save your filtered links with detailed descriptions, thumbnails, and page titles in various formats:

1. HTML (List & Grid layouts).
2. Markdown.
3. CSV.
4. JSON.

With BulkLinker, managing and opening multiple links is fast, efficient, and hassle-free, all while keeping your privacy intact. Try it out today and simplify your workflow!
